synopsis.text:
Kaidan is a chilling anime that follows the journey of two siblings, Satsuki and Keiichirou Miyanoshita, as they navigate the haunted halls of their new school. After moving to their mother's hometown following her tragic death, the pair discover that the local school is plagued by vengeful ghosts. Initially dismissing the rumors, they soon realize the terrifying truth and find themselves targeted by the malevolent spirits.

With the help of their pet cat, the siblings team up with newfound friends to combat the supernatural forces. Armed with their mother's old book of spells and a crafty demon cat named Kaaya, the group sets out to seal away the ghosts and protect the town.

But it won't be easy - from creepy dolls to deadly nurses, the gang must face a variety of supernatural phenomena while balancing their schoolwork. Can they succeed in their mission and rid Kaaya's body of the powerful demon lord Amanojaku, or will they be haunted forever? Join Satsuki and her friends as they fight to save their town and uncover the secrets of their mother's past.
